long_description: Half smartphone protector and half billfold, the pocket-size Pinch Phone Wallet from Timbuk2 lets you access your apps, texts, credit cards, cash and driver's license all in one place. Case allows you to use your phone without exposing it to the elements, and handily hides your cards and cash. Separate compartment for your ID, cards and cash. Outside zipper pocket for coins. Pinch Phone Wallet is made with durable Timbuk2 fine-weave ballistic nylon. Closeout.
short_description: Half smartphone protector and half billfold, the pocket-size Pinch Phone Wallet from Timbuk2 lets you access your apps, texts, credit cards, cash and driver's license all in one place.
